title: Blind Control Module
description:
BLIND_SCENE stores up to 16 scenes consisting of relevant current blind

position and angle, and can restore these scenes during retrieval. Every

scene can be active or inactive, depending on whether saving the scene

the input ENABLE was TRUE or not (ENABLE = TRUE means active). A sce￾ne is retrieved by the number of the scene (0 .. 15) is applied at the input

SCENE and simultaneously ENABLE is set to TRUE. A scene can only be ac￾cessed if both the inputs UP and DN are the same TRUE (automatic mode).

This ensures that an active scene always overridden by the manual mode

of operation is.

The following table illustrates the operation of BLIND_SCENE:

UP DN ENABLE SWRITE SCENE QU QD PO AO

1 1 0 0 - 1 1 PI AI no scene

- - 1 1 y - - - - write scene number y

- - 0 1 y - - - - disable scene number y

1 1 1 0 y 1 1 - - recall scene number y

The input S_IN and output STATUS are ESR compliant inputs and outputs,

through input S_IN upstream modules report their status to the module,

this status will be forwarded to the output of STATUS, and own status mes￾sages issued also on STATUS.

STATUS Meaning

160 .. 175 scenes 0..15 active

176 Scene written

88 Version 1.00

name: BLIND_SCENE

input.name: UP
input.description: Input UP signal to enable the upward movement of the blind.

input.name: DN
input.description: Input DOWN signal to enable the downward movement of the blind.

input.name: S_IN
input.description: ESR compliant status input from upstream modules.

input.name: PI
input.description: Input value of the blind position in automatic mode.

input.name: AI
input.description: Input value of the blade angle in automatic mode.

input.name: ENABLE
input.description: Enable input for saving the scene.

input.name: SWRITE
input.description: Write input to save the current scene.

input.name: SCENE
input.description: Number of the scene to be saved or recalled.

output.name: QU
output.description: Motor up signal indicating the blind is moving up.

output.name: QD
output.description: Motor down signal indicating the blind is moving down.

output.name: STATUS
output.description: ESR compliant status output representing the status of the module.

output.name: PO
output.description: Output value of the blind position in automatic mode.

output.name: AO
output.description: Output value of the blade angle in automatic mode.
